title: Hybrid Science Education Curriculum for Information Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Majority of learners are working professionals requiring flexible scheduling, with a focus on developing science-informed problem-solving skills for real-life applications

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliable scientific information sources with 80% accuracy
Learners can demonstrate the process of effectively searching, evaluating, and integrating scientific information using digital tools
Learners can explain how to utilize open educational resources (OER) in compliance with CC license regulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
